long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
LIT is a Chrome extension designed to help users manage and limit their internet usage, promoting better time management, productivity, and parental control. Its main features include a timer, start-pause-restart functions, an add-time function, and the ability to block browsing once the allotted time is up. It offers a "parent mode" for unlocking unlimited browsing, catering to both parental control and productivity enhancement needs.
